title: Orange Point Free Watch Face
summary: Orange Point - stylish modern analog watch face with date and watch battery.
description: Orange Point Watch Face is a stylish and useful analog watch face especially designed for every day use.Works on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch and otherAndroid Wear devices.Supports round and square displays.Key features:- Date and day of the week.- Watch battery digital and graphical indicator.- Customizable color of the clock hands and battery indicator.Find more great themes and features in the premium version http://goo.gl/CgsyMn Get additional info about our watch faces at:Google+: https://goo.gl/xvm05bTwitter: https://twitter.com/watchstudio1Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/482369191929905/To install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose  Orange Point Free Watch Face as you watch face.
descriptionHTML:
Orange Point Watch Face is a stylish and useful analog watch face especially designed for every day use.
Works on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch and otherAndroid Wear devices.
Supports round and square displays.

Key features:

- Date and day of the week.
- Watch battery digital and graphical indicator.
- Customizable color of the clock hands and battery indicator.

Find more great themes and features in the premium version http://goo.gl/CgsyMn

Get additional info about our watch faces at:
Google+: https://goo.gl/xvm05b
Twitter: https://twitter.com/watchstudio1
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/482369191929905/

To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Orange Point Free Watch Face as you watch face.
comments: My Favorite Watch Face!! After months of searching the perfect one, I came across this beauty, and guess what? I am absolutely satisfied. Design is sporty as well as elegant, no-frills and functional. I just have a few suggestions which would make this even more awesome! I would like to share if you guys could tell me where should I email them! :)
Love the look, simplicity and the battery widget. Classic but simple, nice *****
Does not work with my moto360 v1
Nice clean face, with very little impact on battery life.
Very Nice! Overall lovely watch face. 10/10!
Not working on samsung gear fit?
recentChanges: fixed issue with blank watch face in some cases after update/install.
